chamber.address: 55 Satmasjid Road, Zigatola Bus Stand, Dhanmondi

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Zakir Hossain
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Zakir Hossain is a Rheumatologist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS (CMC), BCS (Health), MD (Rheumatology). He is a Consultant, Rheumatology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital). Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Zakir Hossain at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital) is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
